thread.section_title: WWNY - Entertainment - Craig's To Do List
thread.title: Art For Animals

title: Art For Animals
text: 14, 2015 at 12:37 PM   14, 2015 at 12:37 PM EDT Art for Animals: An exhibit to benefit the Potsdam Humane Society ! October 9 – October 28, 2015 at the SLC Arts Gallery at Town Hall. Opening night reception: Friday, October 16, 5-7 PM. 18 Elm St , Potsdam , NY 13676 A collection of portraits of shelter animals done by local students and artists. These portraits will be done in all types of media, and will feature animals currently up for adoption, animals who have been adopted from the PHS, and the artist’s own pets. Stay tuned for information about how to submit a piece to this show. 70% of the sales from this show go to the Potsdam Humane Society! Phone:
